text: human i don't mean to be rude but i've
observed you struggling with very simple
arithmetic yet it is my understanding
that your education should have prepared
you to solve much more complex equations
than formulas it's correct that at one
point i was capable of understanding and
performing a much higher level of
mathematics but a lot of specific
knowledge doesn't follow you past the
basic schooling program into your
adulthood that system feels fairly
inefficient then well our schooling
system is actually designed to teach us
skills more so than trivia i don't need
to know specific formulas in my adult
life what math teaches me is problem
solving skills i don't have to write
research papers in my everyday life but
it is important that i know how to
research how to find sources and back up
evidence for my beliefs so where your
schooling failed in specifics it
succeeded in ability and now you have
been adequately trained to join society
upon finishing no i possess very few of
those abilities to this day
but you said that was the intent not the
effect my schooling only gave me
imposter syndrome and a praise kink
